=Heading1= How To Install Plugin:

You need to have Firebug installed on Firefox.<br>
Go to project webpage - http://sirmasolutions.com/products/ml-firefox-console<br>
Click the green button "Add to Firefox' and the plugin will start installing.<br> 
Rebooting Firefox is needed after successful completion. <br>
After the reboot a new tab 'ConcoleML' will be visible in Firebug. <br>
Open it and click on the Log link to setup your log configuration. <br>
Please check 'Help' for additional information.
